thread_replies.text:
#Wish
#FridayRoadshow
The contrast between King Magnifico, who seems to cherish everyone's wishes, and Asha, who only has eyes for her grandfather's wish...

thread_replies.author: Azumoff
thread_replies.text:
In the song scene "Shining Wish" from "Wish,"

Magnifico geometrically arranges the wish orbs, while Asha dismantles them.

Moreover, while Magnifico moves the wish orbs with magic, Asha is naturally approached by the wish orbs themselves.

Even though they sing the same lyrics

tweets.text:
The "Wishing Tree," where Asha makes her wish, is said to have been inspired by the Dreaming Tree (the tree under which Walt is said to have daydreamed) located in the garden of the house where Walt Disney spent his childhood.

The image of an ordinary person changing the world
